articles.description: Tom Sellek and Bridget Moynahan were among the Blue Bloods cast who paid tribute to Treat Williams after his death in a motorcycle wreck.
articles.content:
Treat Williams in CBS interview.
The world lost a gem this week, when longtime actor Treat Williams died in a motorcycle wreck near his home in Vermont on June 12. Tributes have flooded in from fans… [+2898 chars]
